医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明 Omicron 变体像前辈一样逃避免疫系统，这表明 SARS-CoV-2 的关键进化特征研究人员比较了 SARS-CoV-2 Omicron 变体在人类细胞系和原代气道培养物中的复制情况，并测量了宿主对感染的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-shows-Omicron-variants-evade-immune-system-like-predecessors-suggesting-key-evolutionary-trait-in-SARS-CoV-2。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Study-shows-Omicron-variants-evade-immune-system-like-predecessors-suggesting-key-evolutionary-trait-in-SARS-CoV-2。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c775be9-60b2-48ec-a288-c2b2775de4ea Fri, 19 Jan 2024 06:14:00 -0500 Study shows Omicron variants evade immune system like predecessors, suggesting key evolutionary trait in SARS-CoV-2
临床研究表明他汀类药物可能是减少心力衰竭患者痴呆症的关键他汀类药物治疗与心力衰竭患者痴呆风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Clinical-study-suggests-statins-could-be-key-in-reducing-dementia-in-individuals-with-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Clinical-study-suggests-statins-could-be-key-in-reducing-dementia-in-individuals-with-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34d19ada-83d1-495c-b04e-c54c2f4bdf31 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 06:09:00 -0500 Clinical study suggests statins could be key in reducing dementia in individuals with heart failure
临床试验表明，通过 MRI 和跟踪引导向严重抑郁症患者的大脑发送磁刺激可以缓解症状研究人员进行了一项随机临床试验，比较静息态功能磁共振成像连接引导的间歇性 θ 爆发刺激与重复经颅磁刺激治疗难治性抑郁症的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Clinical-trial-shows-MRI-and-tracking-guided-delivery-of-Magnetic-stimulation-to-brains-of-people-with-severe-抑郁症缓解症状.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Clinical-trial-shows-MRI-and-tracking-guided-delivery-of-Magnetic-stimulation-to-brains-of-people-with-severe-抑郁症缓解症状.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94312636-256e-4aad-bf93-ee036e12e49a Fri, 19 Jan 2024 05:59:00 -0500 Clinical trial shows MRI and tracking-guided delivery of magnetic stimulation to brains of people with severe depression eases symptoms
新研究揭示了用于发现 SARS-CoV-2 抗体的人工智能工具的缺陷SARS-CoV-2-nAB 的发现计划可能针对其耐药菌株。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-study-reveals-flaws-in-AI-tools-used-for-SARS-CoV-2-antibody-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/New-study-reveals-flaws-in-AI-tools-used-for-SARS-CoV-2-antibody-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b729be1e-a2e3-4600-bdc2-261ef6ac3ac8 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 05:36:00 -0500 New study reveals flaws in AI tools used for SARS-CoV-2 antibody discovery
骑自行车通勤可以改善心理健康吗？研究人员探讨骑自行车通勤是否可以缓解不良的心理健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Can-cycle-commuting-improve-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Can-cycle-commuting-improve-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e69a99c-3420-4bf4-95d4-4fa7f4044a4e Fri, 19 Jan 2024 04:44:00 -0500 Can cycle commuting improve mental health?
弱势群体迫切需要持续接种 COVID-19 加强疫苗接种研究人员调查了优先考虑 COVID-19 加强疫苗接种的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/The-crucial-need-for-ongoing-COVID-19-booster-vaccination-in-vulnerable-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/The-crucial-need-for-ongoing-COVID-19-booster-vaccination-in-vulnerable-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3316ada6-60e5-4f7b-9e6b-7512c7e6c031 Fri, 19 Jan 2024 04:40:00 -0500 The crucial need for ongoing COVID-19 booster vaccination in vulnerable populations
探索益生菌对预防精神科药物引起的体重增加的影响研究人员讨论了益生菌的有效性及其在减少药物引起的体重减轻方面的用途。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Exploring-the-impact-of-probiotics-on-preventing-weight-gain-from-psychiatric-medication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240119/Exploring-the-impact-of-probiotics-on-preventing-weight-gain-from-psychiatric-medication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=184304ed-4cb5-4763-8d1a-b60f4cce4f8d Fri, 19 Jan 2024 04:11:00 -0500 Exploring the impact of probiotics on preventing weight gain from psychiatric medication
研究提供了减肥对 2 型糖尿病患者有益的新证据RCSI 医学与健康科学大学人口健康学院的研究人员提供了新的证据，证明减肥努力对健康有益，可以缓解 2 型糖尿病患者的糖尿病症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Study-provides-new-evidence-of-weight-loss-benefits-for-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Study-provides-new-evidence-of-weight-loss-benefits-for-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15705205​​-794f-41ff-b5ba-f746d0ed0689 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 23:06:14 -0500 Study provides new evidence of weight loss benefits for type 2 diabetes patients
研究人员受生物发光启发，开发出一种潜在的一分钟 COVID-19 测试感冒、流感和 COVID-19 季节带来了现在熟悉的仪式：拭子，等待，看看结果。但是，如果测试可以通过发光化学物质快速确定您是否感染了 COVID-19，而不是花费 15 分钟或更长时间，结果会怎样呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Researchers-develop-a-潜在-一分钟-COVID-19-test-inspired-by-bioluminescent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Researchers-develop-a-潜在-一分钟-COVID-19-test-inspired-by-bioluminescent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b55a1a4e-5cba-4b69-93f2-2c3774b6bd03 Thu, 18 Jan 2024 22:50:38 -0500 Researchers develop a potential one-minute COVID-19 test inspired by bioluminescence
精液微生物群可能在影响男性生育能力方面发挥至关重要的作用您可能听说过肠道微生物组及其对人的整体健康和福祉的影响。事实证明，精液微生物组也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Semen-microbiota-might-play-a-crucial-role-in-influencing-male-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240118/Semen-microbiota-might-play-a-crucial-role-in-influencing-male-fertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=796d3a46-1d46-454e-974d-b0b23b6f9d9d Thu, 18 Jan 2024 22:45:12 -0500 Semen microbiota might play a crucial role in influencing male fertility
